  • Graphics: 1280x720 or better video resolution in High Color mode

  • Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound card

  • Processor: 2.4 GHz Dual-Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1280x720 or better video resolution in High Color mode

  • Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound card
